name: turtle
author: FantaLaTone
description: {Turtle} is a bot for Turtle In The Circle Discord.

scripts.replit-node-update: npm i --save-dev node@16 && npm config set prefix=$(pwd)/node_modules/node && export PATH=$(pwd)/node_modules/node/bin:$PATH
scripts.replit-node-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm cache clean --force && npm i
scripts.replit-setup: npm run replit-node-update && npm run replit-node-clean
